summary: Windows CI tests for the PHP SDK fail with exit code -1073741819 despite test logic passing, potentially related to improper termination of RoadRunner or Temporal CLI processes.
userImpact: Developers cannot reliably run or validate PHP SDK tests on Windows, blocking CI/CD and local development workflows.
rootCause: Unclear process termination behavior for RoadRunner or Temporal CLI on Windows, possibly related to protobuf extension presence/absence.
workaround: Installing the protobuf extension may resolve the issue in some cases, though this is not a reliable fix.
keyQuote: Sometimes Acceptance and Functional tests in CI end with error code -1073741819. However, the tests themselves pass completely.
